alert.note: Alert for Coweta (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 1:02AM EDT until May 04 at 1:30AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM EDT FOR CENTRAL COWETA COUNTY... At 101 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over East Newnan, or over Newnan, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Newnan, Peachtree City, Tyrone, Palmetto, Moreland, Sharpsburg, Turin, East Newnan, Arnco-Sargent, Dunaway Gardens, Cannongate, Thomas Crossroads and Madras. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
